teaser: Airing on Friday, January 2, 2014: First up on today's show, we talk to Wall Street Journal reporter Christopher Mims about tech startups in 2015. Plus, how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, host Ben Johnson takes on science and technology reporter, Rose Eveleth.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, January 2, 2014
